title: What Is Wordle? How to Play the Viral Word Game and Tricks to Impress Your Friends
sub_head: Everything you need to know about the online game that has taken the internet by storm
body:
Wordle, an online word game, seems like it is everywhere these days. Hereâ€™s what you need to know.
It is a once-a-day word game that has gone viral in recent weeks. It only can be played on a website.
